author: wn.com
title: FRA participates in European Commission’s first Annual Colloquium on Fundamental Rights (FRA - Fundamental Rights ...
text: ( Source : FRA - Fundamental Rights Agency ) The Colloquium, which is taking place on 1-2 October in Brussels , examines the reasons behind antisemitic and anti-Muslim hatred in the EU, its impact on people's lives, and ways of combating both
